## StandardMaterial.getTexCoordTransform() method

Gets the texture transform matrix for given texture coordinate index.

**Signature:**

```typescript
getTexCoordTransform(texCoordIndex: number): Matrix4x4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  texCoordIndex | number | The texture coordinate index |

**Returns:**

[Matrix4x4](doc/markdown/./base.matrix4x4.md)

Texture transform matrix
